title.narrative: Support to China's Sustainable Trade and Investment System

description.narrative: To provide continued support to China facilitating a sustainable trade and investment system and to further enhance China's economic, regulatory, legal and administrative reform capacity.

participating-org.narrative: European Commission - Directorate-General for International Partnerships (INTPA)
European Commission - Directorate-General for International Partnerships (INTPA)

title.narrative: Level of China¿s trade processing and customs policy modernisation in line with international standards

description.narrative: Level of China¿s trade processing and customs policy modernisation in line with international standards

title.narrative: Level of China¿s trade processing and customs policy modernisation in line with international standards

description.narrative: Reported results indicators by the European Commission ¿ International Cooperation and Development (DEVCO) may not represent the complete set of indicators monitored for the project. The results are reported using a contribution approach. This means that where a project has been financed by the EU jointly with other funders ¿ such as partner country governments or other donors ¿ the overall outputs of the collective effort are reported rather than outputs attributed to the share of funding provided by the EU. For higher levels of results, such as outcomes and impacts, the project will only have contributed to the overall effort.

baseline.value: trade across borders limited due to lack of compatibility with international customs methods

comment.narrative: trade across borders limited due to lack of compatibility with international customs methods

target.value: international trade and customs policy modernised to international (WTO and EU) standards

comment.narrative: international trade and customs policy modernised to international (WTO and EU) standards

actual.value: China's customs infrastructure (policy, agreements and physical verification methods) was updated with project direct contribution (leading to improved trade across borders)

baseline.value: growth not in alignment to 5-Year plan

comment.narrative: growth not in alignment to 5-Year plan

actual.value: Growth more aligned with the 5-Year Plan in all of the sectors supported

description.narrative: Reported results indicators by the European Commission ¿ International Cooperation and Development (DEVCO) may not represent the complete set of indicators monitored for the project. The results are reported using a contribution approach. This means that where a project has been financed by the EU jointly with other funders ¿ such as partner country governments or other donors ¿ the overall outputs of the collective effort are reported rather than outputs attributed to the share of funding provided by the EU. baseline.value: Limited compliance with international standards on animal health

comment.narrative: Limited compliance with international standards on animal health

target.value: international standards compliance in animal health improved

comment.narrative: international standards compliance in animal health improved

actual.value: international standards compliance in animal health improved (via enhanced institutional capacity achieved in animal disease prevention, disease surveillance, animal welfare and laboratory quality assurance)
